sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT PRT_AT_CODE, FEE_TP, FISCAL_YR, BILL_NO, DLY_SER_NO, TO_CHAR(BILL_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') BILL_DT, TO_CHAR(OCR_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') OCR_DT, TO_CHAR(DUE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') DUE_DATE, TO_CHAR(RCVD_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') RCVD_DT, AGENT_NAME, RCVD_AMNT, COMMISSION, CUSTOMER_NUM, REV_RESULT, REV_RESULT_NM, RET_MSG, '' VACCT_NO, '' RCVD_TP, '' GUBUN, '' FILE_GUBUN FROM ( SELECT PRT_AT_CODE, FEE_TP, FISCAL_YR, BILL_NO, DLY_SER_NO, CASE WHEN SIGN( NVL(TO_NUMBER(DLY_SER_NO), 0) - 0 ) = 0 THEN ( SELECT BILL_DT FROM GAM.REV_COLL_F WHERE PRT_AT_CODE = A.PRT_AT_CODE AND FEE_TP = A.FEE_TP AND FISCAL_YR = A.FISCAL_YR AND BILL_NO = A.BILL_NO ) ELSE ( SELECT DLY_BILL_DT FROM GAM.UNPAID_F WHERE PRT_AT_CODE = A.PRT_AT_CODE AND FEE_TP = A.FEE_TP AND FISCAL_YR = A.FISCAL_YR AND BILL_NO = A.BILL_NO AND DLY_SER_NO = A.DLY_SER_NO ) END BILL_DT, ICHE_DT OCR_DT, RECEIVE_DT RCVD_DT, ( SELECT AGENT_NAME FROM GAM.REV_COLL_F WHERE PRT_AT_CODE = A.PRT_AT_CODE AND FEE_TP = A.FEE_TP AND FISCAL_YR = A.FISCAL_YR AND BILL_NO = A.BILL_NO ) AGENT_NAME, CASE WHEN SIGN(NVL(TO_NUMBER(DLY_SER_NO), 0) - 0) = 0 THEN ( SELECT DUE_DATE FROM GAM.REV_COLL_F WHERE PRT_AT_CODE = A.PRT_AT_CODE AND FEE_TP = A.FEE_TP AND FISCAL_YR = A.FISCAL_YR AND BILL_NO = A.BILL_NO ) ELSE ( SELECT DLY_DUE_DT FROM GAM.UNPAID_F WHERE PRT_AT_CODE = A.PRT_AT_CODE AND FEE_TP = A.FEE_TP AND FISCAL_YR = A.FISCAL_YR AND BILL_NO = A.BILL_NO AND DLY_SER_NO = A.DLY_SER_NO ) END DUE_DATE, AMOUNT RCVD_AMNT, COMMISSION, CUSTOMER_NUM, REV_RESULT, DECODE(REV_RESULT, '1','수납','2','수납오류', '3','수납금액 불일치','4','수납자료 미존재','5','수납고지서 미출력', '6','연체수납','7','연체수납오류','8','연체수납 불일치', '9','연체수납 미존재','A','현체수납고지서 미출력','B','이중수납', 'C','연체이중수납') REV_RESULT_NM, RET_MSG FROM ( SELECT CUSTOMER_NUM, SUBSTR(TRIM(LEADING '0' FROM CUSTOMER_NUM), 1,3) PRT_AT_CODE, CHR(SUBSTR(TRIM(LEADING '0' FROM CUSTOMER_NUM), 4,2)) || SUBSTR(TRIM(LEADING '0' FROM CUSTOMER_NUM), 6,1) FEE_TP, SUBSTR(TRIM(LEADING '0' FROM CUSTOMER_NUM), 7,4) FISCAL_YR, SUBSTR(TRIM(LEADING '0' FROM CUSTOMER_NUM), 11,6) BILL_NO, DECODE(SIGN(LENGTH(TRIM(LEADING '0' FROM CUSTOMER_NUM)) - 18 ), -1, NULL, SUBSTR(TRIM(LEADING '0' FROM CUSTOMER_NUM), 17,2)) DLY_SER_NO, ICHE_DT, RECEIVE_DT, AMOUNT, COMMISSION, RET_MSG, REV_RESULT FROM PAYEOSU.OCR_RESULT@YGPA_PORTMIS B WHERE 1=1
AND RECEIVE_DT >= TO_DATE(#sRcvdPdFrom#,'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND RECEIVE_DT < TO_DATE(#sRcvdPdTo#,'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
AND ICHE_DT >= TO_DATE(#sOcrPdFrom#,'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND ICHE_DT < TO_DATE(#sOcrPdTo#,'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
AND SYS_GUBUN='G' ) A ) WHERE 1=1
AND PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND FISCAL_YR = #sFiscalYr#
AND FEE_TP = #sFeeTp#
AND BILL_NO = #sBillNo#
) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT PRT_AT_CODE, FEE_TP, FISCAL_YR, BILL_NO, DLY_SER_NO, CASE WHEN SIGN( NVL(TO_NUMBER(DLY_SER_NO), 0) - 0 ) = 0 THEN ( SELECT BILL_DT FROM GAM.REV_COLL_F WHERE PRT_AT_CODE = A.PRT_AT_CODE AND FEE_TP = A.FEE_TP AND FISCAL_YR = A.FISCAL_YR AND BILL_NO = A.BILL_NO ) ELSE ( SELECT DLY_BILL_DT FROM GAM.UNPAID_F WHERE PRT_AT_CODE = A.PRT_AT_CODE AND FEE_TP = A.FEE_TP AND FISCAL_YR = A.FISCAL_YR AND BILL_NO = A.BILL_NO AND DLY_SER_NO = A.DLY_SER_NO ) END BILL_DT, ICHE_DT OCR_DT, RECEIVE_DT RCVD_DT, ( SELECT AGENT_NAME FROM GAM.REV_COLL_F WHERE PRT_AT_CODE = A.PRT_AT_CODE AND FEE_TP = A.FEE_TP AND FISCAL_YR = A.FISCAL_YR AND BILL_NO = A.BILL_NO ) AGENT_NAME, CASE WHEN SIGN(NVL(TO_NUMBER(DLY_SER_NO), 0) - 0) = 0 THEN ( SELECT DUE_DATE FROM GAM.REV_COLL_F WHERE PRT_AT_CODE = A.PRT_AT_CODE AND FEE_TP = A.FEE_TP AND FISCAL_YR = A.FISCAL_YR AND BILL_NO = A.BILL_NO ) ELSE ( SELECT DLY_DUE_DT FROM GAM.UNPAID_F WHERE PRT_AT_CODE = A.PRT_AT_CODE AND FEE_TP = A.FEE_TP AND FISCAL_YR = A.FISCAL_YR AND BILL_NO = A.BILL_NO AND DLY_SER_NO = A.DLY_SER_NO ) END DUE_DATE, AMOUNT RCVD_AMNT, COMMISSION, CUSTOMER_NUM, REV_RESULT, DECODE(REV_RESULT, '1','수납','2','수납오류', '3','수납금액 불일치','4','수납자료 미존재','5','수납고지서 미출력', '6','연체수납','7','연체수납오류','8','연체수납 불일치', '9','연체수납 미존재','A','현체수납고지서 미출력','B','이중수납', 'C','연체이중수납') REV_RESULT_NM, RET_MSG FROM ( SELECT CUSTOMER_NUM, SUBSTR(TRIM(LEADING '0' FROM CUSTOMER_NUM), 1,3) PRT_AT_CODE, CHR(SUBSTR(TRIM(LEADING '0' FROM CUSTOMER_NUM), 4,2)) || SUBSTR(TRIM(LEADING '0' FROM CUSTOMER_NUM), 6,1) FEE_TP, SUBSTR(TRIM(LEADING '0' FROM CUSTOMER_NUM), 7,4) FISCAL_YR, SUBSTR(TRIM(LEADING '0' FROM CUSTOMER_NUM), 11,6) BILL_NO, DECODE(SIGN(LENGTH(TRIM(LEADING '0' FROM CUSTOMER_NUM)) - 18 ), -1, NULL, SUBSTR(TRIM(LEADING '0' FROM CUSTOMER_NUM), 17,2)) DLY_SER_NO, ICHE_DT, RECEIVE_DT, AMOUNT, COMMISSION, RET_MSG, REV_RESULT FROM PAYEOSU.OCR_RESULT@YGPA_PORTMIS B WHERE 1=1
AND RECEIVE_DT >= TO_DATE(#sRcvdPdFrom#,'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND RECEIVE_DT < TO_DATE(#sRcvdPdTo#,'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
AND ICHE_DT >= TO_DATE(#sOcrPdFrom#,'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND ICHE_DT < TO_DATE(#sOcrPdTo#,'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
AND SYS_GUBUN='G' ) A ) WHERE 1=1 AND PRT_AT_CODE LIKE NVL('621', '%')
